fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack a player at night. You will also numb the target and anyone they attempted to visit that night, roleblocking them tonight and the next night.
-Swap roles with a player at night, with the exception of faction and goal staying the same. This happens after all other actions resolve that night. You cannot use this on the same night as another ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Numbing does not penetrate roleblock immunity.
-You will be aware of who you attempt to numb.
-Metamorph-aligned players are immune to your numbing.
-If you are alive and Metamorph-aligned in a Metamorph victory, that victory is nullified and the Good faction wins instead.
